name: Ldap
natural_language_description: 这是 Ldap 节点。主要用于: Interact with LDAP servers

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: search
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new entry
Rename (值: rename) - Rename the DN of an existing entry

nodeDebug.name: nodeDebug
nodeDebug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Debug | 默认值: False

dn.name: dn
dn.description: The distinguished name of the entry to update
dn.natural_language_description: 参数名: DN | 作用: The distinguished name of the entry to update | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the attribute to compare
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attribute ID | 作用: The ID of the attribute to compare | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The value to compare

targetDn.name: targetDn
targetDn.description: The new distinguished name for the entry
targetDn.natural_language_description: 参数名: New DN | 作用: The new distinguished name for the entry | (必填项)

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Attributes | 作用: Update entry attributes | 默认值: {}

baseDN.name: baseDN
baseDN.description: The distinguished name of the subtree to search in
baseDN.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base DN | 作用: The distinguished name of the subtree to search in | (必填项)

searchFor.name: searchFor
searchFor.description: Directory object class to search for
searchFor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search For | 作用: Directory object class to search for | 默认值: []

customFilter.name: customFilter
customFilter.description: Custom LDAP filter. Escape these chars * ( ) \ with a backslash "\".
customFilter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Filter | 作用: Custom LDAP filter. Escape these chars * ( ) \ with a backslash "\". | 默认值: (objectclass=*)

attribute.name: attribute
attribute.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attribute | 作用: Attribute to search for | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

searchText.name: searchText
searchText.description: Text to search for, Use * for a wildcard
searchText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Text | 作用: Text to search for, Use * for a wildcard | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attributes (值: None) - Comma-separated list of attributes to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
pageSize (值: None) - Maximum number of results to request at one time. Set to 0 to disable paging.
scope (值: None) - The set of entries at or below the BaseDN that may be considered potential matches
